amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part C of House Report 116-178 to direct the DHS OIG to pay particular attention to whether CBP meets its own sexual violence prevention standards when inspecting ports of entry, border patrol stations, and detention facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Kuster (NH).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Kuster (NH) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
